Title: xjControls
Description: I found myself rebuilding a handful of controls from project to project. They've reached a decent level of polish so I thought I'd start a repository and package some of these things up.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
I found myself rebuilding a handful of controls from project to project. They've reached a decent level of polish so I thought I'd start a repository and package some of these things up.

I want to deliver easy to implement jQuery plugins, like xjStatusBar, that can also leverage the great design of jQuery UI.

I just started this with some bare bones ASP.Net projects today. I have yet to seed the guts of the plugin properly and get the simple sample online. Ideally, I want to demonstrate xjControls in the ASP.Net MVC template that I included in the source.
